issues.title: Old headers with $Header
issues.body:
There are still ebuilds with the old header format. You can easily remove 
`# $Header: $`
or the ID line by script for all ebuilds.

`    $ sed -i */*/*.ebuild -e '/^# \$Id\$$/d'`

see: https://devmanual.gentoo.org/ebuild-writing/file-format/

issues.title: The dependency of dbus can be removed for sogoupinyin
issues.body:
According to the latest commit of fcitx, the "dbus" USE flag has been removed:
`app-i18n/fcitx: Delete "dbus" USE flag and unconditionally enable support for DBus. `
See [here](https://gitweb.gentoo.org/repo/gentoo.git/commit/?id=94ededead382d8d387b32bf4d1d49357f0335e4e)

So the dependency of dbus shoud also be removed:
RDEPEND=">=app-i18n/fcitx-4.2.8[qt4,X,~~dbus~~]

Otherwise, there will be a dependency conflict while updating fcitx.

issues.title: gentoo-zh need package metadata coverage
issues.body: Many packages' `metadata.xml` are missing, making it difficult to identify the package's current maintainer, as well as making local USE flags' meanings unknown. We should add it as a rule to provide proper metadata when submitting new packages (or even better, force `repoman full` check), while in the meantime start the work of adding metadata to the existing packages. Then eventually, CI can be deployed to perform `repoman` checks to ensure the quality of this repository, thus making it easier to get our packages into gentoo.git :)

issues.title: We Should Start Upstreaming as Much as Possible
issues.body:
Since https://github.com/gentoo/gentoo is available on GitHub and accepts Pull Requests from the general public, we probably should try upstreaming mere version bumps to the mainline. New Pull Requests, if just bump the versions, are probably preferable to be committed to the upstream.

We should update our policies to reflect the changes, I would suggest:

* Trivial version bumps should be preferably committed to the upstream.
* Non-trivial, test-needed and i10n packages should be commited to here first.
* We should work on upstreaming trivial version bumps in our trees to upstream.

龙井 QQ 这么做，他们是承担了法律风险的。你要确保你自己有能力承担这种风险。
这个定制版本 Wine 里不但包含了 QQ 的程序，还包含了来自微软等公司的字体，这才是问题。
@microcai 我当然知道。但我指的是 @173246226 本人的风险。
@173246226 本身提供了新的包，那么他就有风险。有一个办法，就是 @173246226 你也不提供任何问题，让 ebuild 现替换文件。
@173246226 所以你替换了哪些文件，你来说说吧。

@173246226 

我们要达成一些原则，我说一下。
1. 如果互联网上有人已经提供了修改版 QQ，那么就说明他 **想** 承担有关的法律风险。我们也应该尽量多多利用他所提供的文件。让他们背黑锅。
2. 如果为了使用它所提供的文件，我们又打了一个包，进行发布。那么我们有相当大的责任。这是我绝对不能容忍的。如果你这么做，为你个人的安全考虑，我绝对不会允许你的修改版本进入 `gentoo-zh`。

所以，我反对你提供任何形式的文件。

解决的方法非常简单。正如 @microcai 所说：

> ebuild 只是帮助用户管理安装到系统上的程序，本身没有提供程序， 所以不存在法律风险.

也就是说，我们应该让 ebuild 自己下载龙井 QQ 和 _zd423_ 提供的文件。分别解压龙井 QQ 的压缩包和 _zd423_ 的 exe 文件（exe 解压很轻松的），对文件进行替换和修改，最后将它们安装到系统。

虽然稍微有些麻烦，但一点难度都没有。而且任何我们的人也不会因此承担任何责任。

@173246226 @microcai 

好了，相关的讨论可以结束了吧。这个事情我认领了，但最近有些忙，一周后我来进行。相关的讨论也可以不必继续了。

搞定了，请同步 Overlay。

若想使用 zd423/独木成林 版本的 QQ，只要启用 USE `zd423`，再重装 `net-im/wineqq` 即可。别忘了在切换版本时 `rm -rf ~/.longene/`

由于提取替换文件的步骤非常复杂，而且，那个版本 QQ 提供的是百度网盘，无法获取真实链接。于是我又找了一个下载站的链接。

如果处理文件时出错。或者链接失效，请及时回复这个 Bug Report 告知我。

最后再次强调
- 别忘了在切换版本时 `rm -rf ~/.longene/`。
- 及时在这里报告问题，而不是打开一个新 Bug。
@173246226 百度网盘的链接是没有办法获取的，我们又不能冒着法律风险镜像这个文件。

问题已查明。Shadowsocks 确实是无状态的，然而当系统的网络未初始化时，无法解析服务器的域名，导致 Shadowsocks 报错退出。而我们都是用 IP 地址的所以完全无法重现，也完全没有想到这个问题。

Shadowsocks 已将其视为 Bug，并在 `master` 中修复。下个版本就可以移除这个 hack 了。

那下次就说清楚点。提交信息应该不仅仅解释“做什么”，有时还应解释“为何做”。

标题不够用的话，空一行，就可以任意发挥了，写篇小说都没问题。

issues.title: cutegram "qtmultimedia fails with gstreamer" in depend ebuild solved.
issues.body:
Thanks to google, found this web page: https://github.com/GoldenCheetah/GoldenCheetah/issues/942

Bascially what is causing the gstreamer issue is webkit built with gstreamer 1.0 and qtmultimedia with 0.10.

Recommenced fix is change dev-qt/qtmultimedia:5[qml,-gstreamer] in libqtelegram-ae-0.5.0.ebuild to dev-qt/qtmultimedia:5[qml]

And change dev-qt/qtwebkit:5 in cutegram-2.5.0.ebuild to dev-qt/qtwebkit:5[-gstreamer]

This will forced qtwebkit to be either build with use flag gstreamer010 or use flag multimedia that pulls in qumultimedia that will be built with gstreamer 0.10.

This will fix the cutegram hanging after entering phone number with this error in console: "(cutegram:3342): GStreamer-CRITICAL **: gst_element_class_set_details_simple: assertion 'GST_IS_ELEMENT_CLASS (klass)' failed"

I think it's quite a burden to keep the cache fresh after each update, and personally prefer the second approach.
As a reference, the gentoo-haskell overlay does not store the cache.

I will remove `gentoo-zh/metadata/cache` and add the `.gitignore` now, since
- `cache/` in `gentoo-zh` is already dead
- `cache/` should be superseded by `md5-cache/`

Fell free to comment.

Well, sorry again for the disturbance, but in fact the `repo_name` might be different from the overlay's directory name.  This is common for local overlays like `/use/local/portage`, and can also be seen in several public overlays like `gentoo-haskell`.  Besides, `egencache` can be parallelised with option `--jobs`.

Below is my script as a reference.

```
#!/bin/bash
source /etc/init.d/functions.sh

for repo in $(portageq envvar PORTDIR_OVERLAY)
do
    repo="$(cat "${repo}"/profiles/repo_name)"
    ebegin "Regenerating cache for overlay \`${repo}'"
        egencache --jobs=3 --repo="${repo}" --update
    eend "$?"
done
```

I think `amule-dlp-antileech` should be in `net-p2p` instead of `media-plugins`.
See http://code.google.com/p/gentoo-zh/issues/detail?id=7#c15 for details.

I also support `net-p2p`, because amule-dlp-antileech is not a "media" plugin like other packages in `media-plugins`.
Anyway, if you determine to use `media-plugins`, you would need to modify the `RDEPEND` in `amule-dlp-9999.ebuild` because I wrote `net-p2p/amule-dlp-antileech` there.
Just replaced this piece of code with `tc-endian` from `toolchain-funcs`...
I learned about that from `gentoo-dev-help` at freenode, 15 minutes before committing the correspondent revision ;)

抱歉马后炮了，但 `src_configure()` 似乎可以直接写成 `econf $(use_enable debug assert)` 吧？
详见[这里](https://devmanual.gentoo.org/ebuild-writing/functions/src_configure/configuring/index.html)。
而且默认形式的 `src_compile` 和 `src_install` 会从 `base.eclass` 继承的，可以不写……
已 commit，见 8d6e2d3a 。

`GeoIP.dat` 应该是由 `dev-libs/geoip` 提供的。
`<dev-libs/geoip-1.6.1` 中，该文件在 `pkg_postinst` 阶段从 maxmind 网站下载（所以用 `qlist` 或 `equery f` 查询不到）。
`>=dev-libs/geoip-1.6.1` 中，该文件[不再自动下载](https://bugs.gentoo.org/show_bug.cgi?id=513354)，但可以通过手动运行 `/usr/sbin/geoipupdate.sh` 下载。

此外其实还有两个细节问题：
- `net-libs/pacparser` 的作用是什么？
- portage 树已经提供了 `dev-python/dnslib`，因此可以不使用上游提供的 `.egg` 文件。这样可以得到更加及时的更新，且不损害其本身的功能（我自己就是这么做的）。
嗯，dnslib 那一条是我犯傻了……
啊我自己都忘了在这边更新了 -.-

@Amesists Oh well, that's a line I forgot to delete. And fbterm really should be in `RDEPEND`... just wrote the 2 ebuilds yesterday and didn't take the time to proofread them, my fault.

As to the `git-2` eclass, it happened to NOT automatically call the eclass's `src_unpack`, not even after I tried all combinations of `EAPI` and `EGIT_*` variables, the reason I'm not quite sure. I'll fix the first 2 bugs immediately though.

Actually since Gentoo upstream uses different machines for generating the cache without polluting the repo with generated files, I'd prefer removing the cache as well.

Users can manually refresh their caches by installing a hook to their `/etc/portage/postsync.d`. It only have to be executable, one working version by @CasperVector can be found below.

EDIT: Fixed minor issues with supplied hook script, and paraphrased according to the comment directly below this one.
EDIT AGAIN: Remove my quick-and-dirty version of hook script.

MIPS platforms _can_ be little-endian, such as Loongson CPUs, here's `/proc/cpuinfo` of Loongson 2F:

```
system type     : lemote-yeeloong-2f-8.9inches
machine         : Unknown
processor       : 0
cpu model       : ICT Loongson-2 V0.3  FPU V0.1
BogoMIPS        : 520.19
byteorder       : little endian
wait instruction    : no
microsecond timers  : yes
tlb_entries     : 64
extra interrupt vector  : no
hardware watchpoint : yes, count: 0, address/irw mask: []
ASEs implemented    :
shadow register sets    : 1
kscratch registers  : 0
core            : 0
VCED exceptions     : not available
VCEI exceptions     : not available
```

[This link](http://serverfault.com/questions/163487/linux-how-to-tell-if-system-is-big-endian-or-little-endian) has some useful tricks to do this detection.

Oh, that's great... Haven't realized that eclass already has such feature even after tinkering with them last week!

我贴以下自己的解决办法：

`$ qq2012 -reg`

然后改注册表

```
[HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\Software\Microsoft\Windows NT\CurrentVersion\FontSubstitutes]
"MS Shell Dlg"="SimSun"
"MS Shell Dlg 2"="SimSun"
"Tahoma"="SimSun"
```

如果可以还是希望 gentoo-zh 考虑对默认设置做点什么

@Amesists 看了下似乎gentoo-zh中的wineqq是将wine内置。

捆绑的wine中直接装上simsun了，即使系统内没装宋体也不应该有问题，Tahoma怎么也不可能渲染中文吧。那个解决方法就是在龙井那边的论坛上看到的……没见那边有改动的意思，也不知道为什么……
@biergaizi 我不明白您的意思，请您指明。

@biergaizi  如果要在ebuild中添加消息，是不是只需要`elog`就行……

或者在ebuild中对`/opt/longene/qq2012/qq2012.sh`做点手脚？让它每次对`~/.longene/qq2012/system.reg`更改？

不知道什么原因。可能locale(我是en_UTF-8)或其它什么搞不清什么的原因吧。
但不认为清理.longene有什么用，即使现在把.longene删掉让qq2012重新解压过来，还是部分中文是方块。
我还是得自己改下system.reg来解决它。
让有问题的自己google吧，他们会找到答案的

按以下步骤操作字体没有问题：

``` bash
 ~ ⮀ rm -rf .longene 
 ~ ⮀ export LC_ALL=zh_CN.UTF-8
 ~ ⮀ qq2012 
* QQ.exe is not found! Unzip package needed.
* Unzip ...... Please be patient to wait
* Done, Enjoy it!
* Seems the first time to run. Here we go!
```

果然是locale的问题……我自己在`/opt/longene/qq2012/qq2012.sh`添加句`export LC_ALL=zh_CN.UTF-8`……

建议去掉 system-wine 对系统wine的版本限制。
1. 我在32位机器上测试了 wine-1.5.30 ，运行longene环境的qq2012没有任何问题。

systemd可以指定启动顺序啊
2015年3月8日 14:53于 "Havanna" notifications@github.com写道：

> 系统今天上午也切换到 systemd了，没办法，大势所趋。发现一个问题，每次启动系统后，shadowsocks-client.service
> 一直是失败，需要重启 systemctl restart shadowsocks-client 才行，查看了下日志
> 
> journalctl -b _PID=2955
> -- Logs begin at Sat 2015-03-07 03:29:30 CST, end at Sun 2015-03-08
> 14:43:14 CST. --
> Mar 08 14:41:04 havee systemd[2955]: Executing: /usr/bin/ss-local -c
> /etc/shadowsocks.json
> Mar 08 14:41:05 havee ss-local[2955]: 2015-03-08 14:41:04 INFO: initialize
> ciphers... aes-256-cfb
> Mar 08 14:41:05 havee ss-local[2955]: 2015-03-08 14:41:04 INFO: listening
> at 127.0.0.1:1080
> Mar 08 14:41:05 havee ss-local[2955]: 2015-03-08 14:41:04 ERROR:
> getaddrinfo: Temporary failure in name resolution
> Mar 08 14:41:05 havee ss-local[2955]: 2015-03-08 14:41:04 ERROR: failed to
> resolve the provided hostname
> 
> 不太理解 ss-local 的工作原理，应该是运行 ss-local -s server 后立即进行网络连接的吧，那个时候系统网络还没配置完成吧？
> 
> 所以，[Service] 中应该加上自动重启为好吧？
> 
> Restart=always
> RestartSec=30
> 
> —
> Reply to this email directly or view it on GitHub
> https://github.com/microcai/gentoo-zh/commit/3a1e699366080fbe0ecc0a797d7dd2cde52cdeeb#commitcomment-10088014
> .

1. 第二行写了 `After=network.target` 了，可能是你网络没启动成功？
2. 我在我电脑上试了一下，即使关掉网络，启动这个服务依然没有出错。
3. 如果你觉得这两行可以加，那你可以修改一下，我并不能做主。

review_comments.body: Because I think live version don't need this.
不是 typo, 现在已存在的版本 0.4.1 是稳定版本, 我从 Gentoo 官方源复制的, 不过既然你觉得不放心, 那我就修改就是了.

Yes, I masked sys-dev/python:3.3 and sys-dev/python:3.5 for some compatibility issues and left 3.4 only. Since the upstream developer uses arch linux to develop srain, and gentoo have different python3 versions and Python.h header in different python path, so what do you think?
Theoretically, 3.3 and 3.5 should work if Python.h, and cflags are found.
